guide.title: How to use the calendar
guide.createSlotDesc: Click the '+ Add slot' button at the top of the calendar or select an empty cell on the calendar grid.
guide.editSlotDesc: Hover over a yellow slot and click the pencil icon to edit or the trash icon to delete.
guide.maxDuration: Maximum duration of one slot is 3 hours
guide.noDuplicates: Cannot create two slots at the same time
guide.noOverlap: Slots cannot overlap with existing lessons

header.reminder: Add your free hours to display on Marketplace

lesson_card.title: Lesson details
lesson_card.confirm_no_show: Are you sure the student didn't show up for the lesson?

reschedule.title: Reschedule lesson
reschedule.can_reschedule: Lesson can be rescheduled to this time
